markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Wild Winds Gust](/Feats.aspx?ID=478) <actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Evocation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=65" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
<trait label="Monk" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=112" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 165 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Winds Initiate](/Feats.aspx?ID=463)

**Requirements**
You are in Wild Winds Stance.

</column>

---

You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind. Make a wind crash Strike against each creature in your choice of a 30-foot cone or a 60 foot line. These attacks all count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after you make all the attacks.
name: Wild Winds Gust
requirement: You are in Wild Winds Stance.
requirement_markdown: You are in Wild Winds Stance.

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 14" pfs="Standard" > Wild Winds Gust Two Actions Source Core Rulebook pg. 165 4.0 Prerequisites Wild Winds Initiate Requirements You are in Wild Winds Stance. --- You store up energy and release it in an enormous gust of rushing wind. Make a wind crash Strike against each creature in your choice of a 30-foot cone or a 60 foot line. These attacks all count toward your multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn’t increase until after you make all the attacks.
